title: Google Phone app starts rolling out Material You-inspired dialer to Pixels
content:
It was only a couple of months ago that the Google Phone app was spotted preparing a revamped dialer design with some Material You flare. Now, the update is officially starting to roll out.

moreâ€¦

The post Google Phone app starts rolling out Material You-inspired dialer to Pixels appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: A visual overhaul to the Google Dialer app is now rolling out bringing with it buttons inspired by Material You and Android 12's lockscreen.
